If you want 
to freeze 
breastmilk 
because 
your baby is 
premature 
or ill, ask the 
staff	caring	
for your baby for support and 
information.
Your midwife, health visitor or 
peer supporter can also give 
you practical help and answer 
any questions. You can watch 
a video online at pha.site/
small-wonders The video is 
called Small Wonders and it 
tells you all you need to know 
about breastfeeding an ill or 
premature baby.
